title: Maximum Width Ramp
input: Given an array A of integers, a ramp is a tuple (i, j) for which i < j and A[i] <= A[j].  The width of such a ramp is j - i.
output: Find the maximum width of a ramp in A.  If one doesn't exist, return 0.
solution: Traverse the array while keep a list of decreasing heights and their corresponding indexes. Update the maximum width as traversing
